full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MKHAN CHEN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I GSUNG 'BUM LAS, BDE MCHOG LHA LNGA'I BDAG 'JUG BKRA SHIS DANG BCAS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @016A *, ,(CES DPAL 'KHOR LO SDOM PA DRIL BU LHA LNGA'I SGRUB THABS NGAG 'DON DU BKOD PA 'DI NI, KHYAB BDAG RDO RJE 'CHANG DKON MCHOG RGYAL MTSAN DPAL BZANG PO'I, SGRUB THABS BDE CHEN 'BYUNG GNAS GZHIR BZHAG NAS GSUNGS PA RNAMS ZIN BRIS SU BYAS SHING, DKYIL CHOG BDAG 'JUG RNAMS RJE CHOS KYI GRAGS PA'I GSUNG JI LTA BU BZHIN DU LHA'I BTZUN PA BLO BZANG MING 'CHANG BAS NAG 'GROS SU BKOD PA'O, ,BKRA SHIS, ,)
